<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Represents analyses that only rely on functions&#39; control flow.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This can be used with \\c PreservedAnalyses to mark the CFG as preserved and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="comment">/// to query whether it has been preserved.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The CFG of a function is defined as the set of basic blocks and the edges</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="comment">/// between them. Changing the set of basic blocks in a function is enough to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="comment">/// mutate the CFG. Mutating the condition of a branch or argument of an</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="comment">/// invoked function does not mutate the CFG, but changing the successor labels</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="comment">/// of those instructions does.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cfganalyses"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cfganalyses">CFGAnalyses</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A set of analyses that are preserved following a run of a transformation</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="comment">/// pass.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Transformation passes build and return these objects to communicate which</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="comment">/// analyses are still valid after the transformation. For most passes this is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="comment">/// fairly simple: if they don&#39;t change anything all analyses are preserved,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="comment">/// otherwise only a short list of analyses that have been explicitly updated</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="comment">/// are preserved.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This class also lets transformation passes mark abstract &#42;sets&#42; of analyses</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="comment">/// as preserved. A transformation that (say) does not alter the CFG can</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="comment">/// indicate such by marking a particular AnalysisSetKey as preserved, and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="comment">/// then analyses can query whether that AnalysisSetKey is preserved.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Finally, this class can represent an &quot;abandoned&quot; analysis, which is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="comment">/// not preserved even if it would be covered by some abstract set of analyses.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Given a &#96;PreservedAnalyses&#96; object, an analysis will typically want to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="comment">/// figure out whether it is preserved. In the example below, MyAnalysisType is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="comment">/// preserved if it&#39;s not abandoned, and (a) it&#39;s explicitly marked as</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="comment">/// preserved, (b), the set AllAnalysesOn&lt;MyIRUnit&gt; is preserved, or (c) both</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="comment">/// AnalysisSetA and AnalysisSetB are preserved.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#96;&#96;&#96;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="comment">///   auto PAC = PA.getChecker&lt;MyAnalysisType&gt;();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="comment">///   if (PAC.preserved() || PAC.preservedSet&lt;AllAnalysesOn&lt;MyIRUnit&gt;&gt;() ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="comment">///       (PAC.preservedSet&lt;AnalysisSetA&gt;() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="comment">///        PAC.preservedSet&lt;AnalysisSetB&gt;())) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="comment">///     // The analysis has been successfully preserved ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="comment">///   &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#96;&#96;&#96;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses">PreservedAnalyses</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// A checker object that makes it easy to query for whether an analysis or</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// some set covering it is preserved.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses/preservedanalysischecker"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">PreservedAnalysisChecker &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses/preservedanalysischecker/#a95bf63b09676aa0018e54d1592c7d912"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">friend</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses/preservedanalysischecker/#a95bf63b09676aa0018e54d1592c7d912">PreservedAnalyses</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses/preservedanalysischecker/#a95bf63b09676aa0018e54d1592c7d912">PreservedAnalyses</a> &amp;PA;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/analysiskey">AnalysisKey</a> &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ID;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsAbandoned;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// A PreservedAnalysisChecker is tied to a particular Analysis because</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// &#96;preserved()&#96; and &#96;preservedSet()&#96; both return false if the Analysis</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// was abandoned.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><Highlight kind="normal">    PreservedAnalysisChecker(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses/preservedanalysischecker/#a95bf63b09676aa0018e54d1592c7d912">PreservedAnalyses</a> &amp;PA, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/analysiskey">AnalysisKey</a> &#42;ID)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><Highlight kind="normal">        : PA(PA), ID(ID), IsAbandoned(PA.NotPreservedAnalysisIDs.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1772fd431decccb7926d484ea223db7">count</a>(ID)) &#123;&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Returns true if the checker&#39;s analysis was not abandoned and either</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///  - the analysis is explicitly preserved or</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///  - all analyses are preserved.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses/preservedanalysischecker/#a2f84945a09787006fe8e0c94e1de89f1"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses/preservedanalysischecker/#a2f84945a09787006fe8e0c94e1de89f1">preserved</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> !IsAbandoned &amp;&amp; (PA.PreservedIDs.count(&amp;AllAnalysesKey) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="normal">                              PA.PreservedIDs.count(ID));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Return true if the checker&#39;s analysis was not abandoned, i.e. it was not</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// explicitly invalidated. Even if the analysis is not explicitly</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// preserved, if the analysis is known stateless, then it is preserved.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses/preservedanalysischecker/#a48ecc8b3108b550239565f675adfd6f8"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses/preservedanalysischecker/#a48ecc8b3108b550239565f675adfd6f8">preservedWhenStateless</a>() &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> !IsAbandoned; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Returns true if the checker&#39;s analysis was not abandoned and either</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///  - \\p AnalysisSetT is explicitly preserved or</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///  - all analyses are preserved.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses/preservedanalysischecker/#abaaa2690a96aed712836f8f292d8128c"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AnalysisSetT&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses/preservedanalysischecker/#abaaa2690a96aed712836f8f292d8128c">preservedSet</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/analysissetkey">AnalysisSetKey</a> &#42;SetID = AnalysisSetT::ID();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> !IsAbandoned &amp;&amp; (PA.PreservedIDs.count(&amp;AllAnalysesKey) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="normal">                              PA.PreservedIDs.count(SetID));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
